title: 关于clip与gaussian噪声的疑问
body:
看了一下DDPG与PPO例子，有两个细节不太清楚。

1、无论是DDPG还是PPO，都采取了"train阶段加clip和action_mapping，而test阶段只加action_mapping"的方式，代码如下所示：
```
        #train
        action = agent.policy_sample(obs)
        action = np.clip(action, -1.0, 1.0)
        action = action_mapping(action, env.action_space.low[0],
                                env.action_space.high[0])

       #test
        action = agent.policy_predict(obs)
        action = action_mapping(action, env.action_space.low[0],
                                env.action_space.high[0])
```
由于agent和model层并未进行action的clip，这样能保证test阶段action的预测值在(-1.0,1.0)之间吗？如果不能保证，直接action_mapping会不会有偏差？

2、DDPG与PPO加高斯噪声的时机不一样。
DDPG在模型之外加的噪声:
```
        # Add exploration noise, and clip to [-1.0, 1.0]
        action = np.clip(np.random.normal(action, 1.0), -1.0, 1.0)
        action = action_mapping(action, env.action_space.low[0],
                                env.action_space.high[0])
```
PPO在模型内部加的噪声:

```
    def sample(self, obs):
        means, logvars = self.policy(obs)
        sampled_act = means + (             
            layers.exp(logvars / 2.0) *  # stddev
            layers.gaussian_random(shape=(self.act_dim, ), dtype='float32'))
        return sampled_act
```
这两种不同的策略是微调出来的经验，还是都可以使用？另外，直接在model层对于action进行fluid.clip(action,low,high)的方式是不是也可以？

title: 刷POJ、LeetCode(半人工半智能)的baseline已出
body:
经过N次的超参数调整，使用Rainbow（Double-Q + SegmentTree + Advantage）解决八数码问题的模型终于训练完毕。在不知道如何搜索最优解的情况下，根据reward的返回信息，从0开始训练，并自动生成了打表代码。没想到的是，居然冲到了LeetCode的Top1，成为了默认的submission！(虽然本地使用A*算法对拍正确率为98.6%，但并不影响AC，呵呵)
![top1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31379401/58743064-6dc59100-845d-11e9-8daf-cdd6d842c7db.jpg)
所以，困扰我三年以上的一系列问题终于解决：
1、不少知乎大V认为：有了机器学习算法之后，传统《算法导论》了解即可，不需要精读，两者联系不大。
2、99%脉脉帖子认为：刷算法题只是为了应付面试而已，工作上用不到
3、如何使用机器学习解决传统图搜索和离散优化问题？又如何使用传统动态规划和树递归优化深度学习模型？
有了PARL后，以上困惑真的是迎刃而解了——两手抓两手都要硬即可，不仅要要刷更多的题，也要学习更多的模型。
最后，为PARL打call：
深度强化学习框架PARL——联结传统数据结构与算法和新兴深度学习算法的桥梁，算法工程师的不二选择！
O(∩_∩)O

title: 请问Parl的说明文档现在有吗？想看看Parl里的函数
[bug] abnormal GPU detection in Mac Os
body:
```python
export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES="0"
>> from parl.utils import machine_info
>> machine_info.is_gpu_available()
>> True
```
The return of `machine_info.is_gpu_available()` is supposed to be `False` in Mac OS, where GPU has not been installed.

title: 调A2C的例子，把Atarimodel中的Policy network，从cnn换成lstm出现错误信息
reducing the time consuming in tests
body:
Currently, it takes around 25 minutes in unittest teamcity. We can speed up the test by running multiple tests concurrently as the test finishes one by one.
That is, we use `ctest -j10` in `.teamcity/build.sh`, but we need to change our code it make it executable in parallel.

title: paddle.fluid.core_avx.EnforceNotMet: Input(C@GRAD) should not be null
body:
I want to Implement COMA with parl, and I use two fluid.Program() to train critic and actor respectively. however I meat two error related to optimizer.

### error 1:
code:
```python
    def learn(self, obs, actions, last_actions, q_vals, lr):
        """
        Args:
            obs: [4*env*batch,time,84]
            actions: [4*env*batch,time,1]
            last_actions: [4*env*batch,time,1]
            q_vals:[env*batch,4,time,22]
            lr: float scalar of learning rate.
        """
        mac_out = []
        hidden_state = None
        pre_cell = None
        obs_batch = self._build_actor_inputs(obs, last_actions)  # [4*env*batch,time,106]
        for t in range(obs_batch.shape[1]):
            obs_ = layers.slice(obs_batch, axes=[1], starts=[t], ends=[t + 1])  # [4*env*batch,106]
            if hidden_state is None:
                hidden_state, pre_cell = self.model.init_hidden_state(obs_)  # [4*env*batch,64]
            logits, hidden_state, pre_cell = self.model.policy(obs_, hidden_state, pre_cell)  # [4*env*batch, 22]
            mac_out.append(logits)  # [times,4*env*batch, 22]
        mac_out = layers.stack(mac_out, axis=1)  # [4*env*batch,time,22]

        # Calculated baseline

        q_vals = layers.reshape(q_vals, [-1, self.action_dim])  # [4*env*batch*(time),22]
        pi = layers.reshape(mac_out, [-1, self.action_dim])  # [4*env*batch*(time),22]
        baseline = layers.reduce_sum(pi * q_vals, dim=-1, keep_dim=True)  # [4*env*batch*(time),1]

        # Calculate policy grad
        actions_for_one_hot = layers.reshape(actions, [-1, 1])  # [4*env*batch*(time),1]
        actions_one_hot = layers.one_hot(actions_for_one_hot, self.action_dim)  # [4*env*batch*(time),22]
        q_taken = layers.reduce_sum(actions_one_hot * q_vals, dim=-1, keep_dim=True)  # [4*env*batch*(time),1]
        pi_taken = layers.reduce_sum(actions_one_hot * pi, dim=-1, keep_dim=True)  # [4*env*batch*time,1]
        log_pi_taken = layers.log(pi_taken)  # [4*env*batch*time,1]

        advantages = (q_taken - baseline)
        coma_loss = layers.reduce_sum(advantages * log_pi_taken)  # [1]

        # Optimise agents
        fluid.clip.set_gradient_clip(
            clip=fluid.clip.GradientClipByGlobalNorm(clip_norm=self.grad_norm_clip))

        optimizer = fluid.optimizer.RMSPropOptimizer(lr, rho=self.optim_alpha, epsilon=self.optim_eps)
        optimizer.minimize(coma_loss) # error
        return coma_loss
```

title: GUNREAL 模型的实现
body:
请问如何实现以下的模型呢？我已经有了一个初步的设计（在`GA3C`的基础上进行的修改）：

![gnome-shell-screenshot-TG4TA0](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22568844/68458166-1235d580-023d-11ea-9e80-5441457a50b9.png)

现在有以下的几个疑问：

## ParallelExecutor 的设计是否正确
```python
self.learn_exe = fluid.ParallelExecutor(
            use_cuda=use_cuda,
            main_program=self.learn_program,
            build_strategy=build_strategy,
            exec_strategy=exec_strategy)
        # 从并行运行的环境中获得训练数据，将会得到 base，pc，vr，rp 的数据
        self.base_sample_exes = []
        for _ in range(base_predict_thread_num):
            with fluid.scope_guard(fluid.global_scope().new_scope()):
                pe = fluid.ParallelExecutor(
                    use_cuda=use_cuda,
                    main_program=self.base_sample_program,
                    build_strategy=build_strategy,
                    exec_strategy=exec_strategy)
                self.base_sample_exes.append(pe)
        self.pc_sample_exes = []
        for _ in range(pc_predict_thread_num):
            with fluid.scope_guard(fluid.global_scope().new_scope()):
                pe = fluid.ParallelExecutor(
                    use_cuda=use_cuda,
                    main_program=self.pc_sample_program,
                    build_strategy=build_strategy,
                    exec_strategy=exec_strategy)
                self.pc_sample_exes.append(pe)
        self.vr_sample_exes = []
        for _ in range(vr_predict_thread_num):
            with fluid.scope_guard(fluid.global_scope().new_scope()):
                pe = fluid.ParallelExecutor(
                    use_cuda=use_cuda,
                    main_program=self.vr_sample_program,
                    build_strategy=build_strategy,
                    exec_strategy=exec_strategy)
                self.vr_sample_exes.append(pe)
```

## Program 是否正确：

```python
# 可能是类似于获得输出名称的 program
        self.base_sample_program = fluid.Program()
        self.vr_sample_program = fluid.Program()
        self.pc_sample_program = fluid.Program()
        # 获取 base，vr，rp ，pc的 program
        # self.predict_program = fluid.Program()
        self.learn_program = fluid.Program()

        with fluid.program_guard(self.base_sample_program):
            # 输入的额state
            base_states = layers.data(name='base_states', shape=self.obs_shape, dtype='float32')
            base_sample_actions, base_values = self.alg.sample(base_states)
            # 输出行为 index，值函数. 为何需要他们的名称？
            self.base_sample_outputs = [base_sample_actions.name, base_values.name]

        with fluid.program_guard(self.pc_sample_program):
            pc_states = layers.data(name='pc_states', shape=self.obs_shape, dtype='float32')
            pc_q, pc_q_max = self.alg.predict_pc_q_and_pc_q_max(pc_states)
            # 输出行为 index，值函数. 为何需要他们的名称？
            self.pc_outputs = [pc_q_max.name]

        with fluid.program_guard(self.vr_sample_program):
            vr_states = layers.data(name='vr_states', shape=self.obs_shape, dtype='float32')
            vr_v = self.alg.predict_vr_value(vr_states)
            # 输出行为 index，值函数. 为何需要他们的名称？
            self.vr_outputs = [vr_v.name]

        with fluid.program_guard(self.learn_program):
            base_states = layers.data(name='base_states', shape=self.obs_shape, dtype='float32')
            # 这个算法自己进行 onehot
            base_actions = layers.data(name='base_actions', shape=[6], dtype='float32')

            base_R = layers.data(name='base_R', shape=[], dtype='float32')
            base_values = layers.data(name='base_values', shape=[], dtype='float32')
            # 辅助任务的数据
            pc_states = layers.data(name='pc_states', shape=self.obs_shape, dtype='float32'); pc_R = layers.data(name='pc_R', shape=[20, 20], dtype='float32'); pc_actions = layers.data(name='pc_actions', shape=[6], dtype='float32')
            vr_states = layers.data(name='vr_states', shape=self.obs_shape, dtype='float32'); vr_R = layers.data(name='vr_R', shape=[], dtype='float32')  # vr
            rp_states = layers.data(name='rp_states', shape=self.obs_shape, dtype='float32'); rp_C = layers.data(name='rp_C', shape=[3], dtype='float32')  # rp
            lr = layers.data(name='lr', shape=[1], dtype='float32', append_batch_size=False)
            entropy_coeff = layers.data(name='entropy_coeff', shape=[], dtype='float32')
            # 包装训练数据
            self.learn_reader = fluid.layers.create_py_reader_by_data(
                capacity=32,
                feed_list=[
                    base_states, base_actions, base_R, base_values,
                    # 其他的辅助任务的数据
                    pc_states, pc_actions, pc_R,
                    vr_states, vr_R,
                    rp_states, rp_C,
                    # 训练网络的数据
                    lr, entropy_coeff
                ])
            base_states, base_actions, base_R, base_values, pc_states, pc_actions, pc_R, vr_states, vr_R, rp_states, rp_C, lr, entropy_coeff = fluid.layers.read_file(self.learn_reader)

            total_loss, pi_loss, vf_loss, entropy, pc_loss, vr_loss, rp_loss = self.alg.learn(
                base_states, base_actions, base_R, base_values,
                # 训练数据
                pc_states, pc_R, pc_actions,
                vr_states, vr_R,
                rp_states, rp_C,
                lr, entropy_coeff)
            self.learn_outputs = [
                total_loss.name, pi_loss.name, vf_loss.name, entropy.name, pc_loss.name, vr_loss.name, rp_loss.name
            ]
```

title: PARL cluster setup failed in windows; get_ip_address not supported
body:
I tried to follow the example in https://parl.readthedocs.io/en/latest/parallel_training/setup.html to setup my windows machine as a cluster. However the xparl start command failed and it seemed the get_ip_address function implemented in parl/utils/machine_info.py doesnt support windows.

my questions are threefold:
1. Does PARL distributed training support windows?
2. If it does support windows, then is the incompatibility of get_ip_address under windows the only reason why the example program failed in my case?
3. how should I fix get_ip_address? (i.e. "set ip address manually", as in the code comment). i am not familiar with socket communication so hopefully there is an easy way...

title: 关于动作分布的计算
body:
ppo和sac都要计算动作的概率，但是处理方法不一样。ppo设置单独的可训练的参数作为方差，并且手写了计算概率和kl的方法。而sac用神经网络拟合出均值和方差，并通过layers.Normal建立动作分布，Normal.sample()采样，Normal.kl_divergence(other)、 Normal.log_prob(action)计算动作概率和kl。这两种有什么区别吗？
PPO：
```
    def _calc_kl(self, means, logvars, old_means, old_logvars):
        log_det_cov_old = layers.reduce_sum(old_logvars)
        log_det_cov_new = layers.reduce_sum(logvars)
        tr_old_new = layers.reduce_sum(layers.exp(old_logvars - logvars))
        kl = 0.5 * (layers.reduce_sum(
            layers.square(means - old_means) / layers.exp(logvars), dim=1) + (
                log_det_cov_new - log_det_cov_old) + tr_old_new - self.act_dim)
        return kl
```
SAC:
```
    def sample(self, obs):
        mean, log_std = self.actor.policy(obs)
        std = layers.exp(log_std)
        normal = Normal(mean, std)
        x_t = normal.sample([1])[0]
        y_t = layers.tanh(x_t)
        action = y_t * self.max_action
        log_prob = normal.log_prob(x_t)
        log_prob -= layers.log(self.max_action * (1 - layers.pow(y_t, 2)) +
                               epsilon)
        log_prob = layers.reduce_sum(log_prob, dim=1, keep_dim=True)
        log_prob = layers.squeeze(log_prob, axes=[1])
        return action, log_prob
```

body:
On win10, I installed latest paddlepaddle and PARL. But no matter which example I run , I am always be informed that :"Cannot find available GPU devices, using CPU now"

But  I did installed paddlepaddle with gpu and run the below script successfully with gpu:
```
import paddle.fluid as fluid
import numpy

train_program = fluid.Program()
startup_program = fluid.Program()
with fluid.program_guard(train_program, startup_program):
    data = fluid.data(name='X', shape=[None, 1], dtype='float32')
    hidden = fluid.layers.fc(input=data, size=10)
    loss = fluid.layers.mean(hidden)
    sgd = fluid.optimizer.SGD(learning_rate=0.001)
    sgd.minimize(loss)

use_cuda = True
place = fluid.CUDAPlace(0) if use_cuda else fluid.CPUPlace()
exe = fluid.Executor(place)

# Run the startup program once and only once.
# Not need to optimize/compile the startup program.
startup_program.random_seed=1
exe.run(startup_program)

# Run the main program directly without compile.
x = numpy.random.random(size=(10, 1)).astype('float32')
loss_data, = exe.run(train_program,
                     feed={"X": x},
                     fetch_list=[loss.name])

# Or use CompiledProgram:
compiled_prog = fluid.CompiledProgram(train_program)
loss_data, = exe.run(compiled_prog,
             feed={"X": x},
             fetch_list=[loss.name])
```

title: 在parl中可能batch_norm函数无法正常使用
body:
win10_64，paddlepaddle: 1.8.1.post107，parl: 1.3 
相关issue: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/issues/24835

经提醒，发现可能是以下2个模块中的batch_norm的函数产生了冲突：
```
from paddle.fluid.layers import *
from parl.core.fluid.layers.layer_wrappers import *
```
PS: 我在vscode中` self.bn1 = layers.batch_norm(act='relu',fuse_with_relu=True)`,ctrl+click跟踪`batch_norm`函数会跟踪到`layers.nn.py`模块中，而在pycharm中会跟踪到`layers_wrappers.py`中。

目前没有发现在parl中使用batch_norm的正确方式。 觉得可能是个隐患，所以发个issue在这里。

title: layers.batch_norm()与paddle.fluid.layers.batch_norm冲突
body:
您好，我收到一个报错:
/opt/conda/envs/python35-paddle120-env/lib/python3.7/site-packages/parl/core/fluid/layers/layer_wrappers.py in __call__(self, input, is_test)
    550                 do_model_average_for_mean_and_var,
    551                 fuse_with_relu=fuse_with_relu,
--> 552                 use_global_stats=use_global_stats)
    553 
    554     return BatchNorm_()
TypeError: batch_norm() got an unexpected keyword argument 'fuse_with_relu'

我的版本: PARL1.3.1，paddlepaddle1.8.2和1.6.3
我怀疑这是parl的一个bug:
parl.layers.batch_norm(),有一个输入参数是fuse_with_relu，该参数在parl.layers.batch_norm()中被传入了paddle.fluid.layers.batch_norm().
但是，paddle.fluid.layers.batch_norm()并没有一个名为fuse_with_relu的输入参数。

```
class DQN(parl.Algorithm):

```
### 然而实际使用中如下：
```
class DQN(parl.Algorithm):
    def __init__(self, model, act_dim=None, gamma=None, lr=None):
        """ DQN algorithm
        
        Args:
            model (parl.Model): 定义Q函数的前向网络结构
            act_dim (int): action空间的维度，即有几个action
            gamma (float): reward的衰减因子
            lr (float): learning rate 学习率.
        """

```

title: [log improvement] no vacant CPU resources.

Some of the xparl users reported that they have K CPUs in the cluster, but xparl will log: `no vacant CPUs`, when the task requires K CPUs `repeatedly` in a short time.

Generally, users are encouraged not to create and destroy actors repeatedly. Maybe we should tell users this problem if he/she creates and destroys the actor repeatedly.

title: 关于强化学习往经验池中预存数据的问题
body:
在复杂环境中,智能体学习的过程非常慢,我的思路是人为给一个大方向,然后智能体再沿着这个大方向探索最优方案,但是我在做的过程中,发现绕不开智能体,不知道有没有什么好方法解决它?

实际训练前:
# 往经验池中预存数据
while len(rpm) < MEMORY_WARMUP_SIZE:
    run_episode(agent, env, rpm)

游戏环境是CarRacing-v0

我的改进是把run_episode改成warn_up:
```python
def WarnUp(env, agent):
    env.render()
    env.viewer.window.on_key_press = key_press
    env.viewer.window.on_key_release = key_release
    obs_list, action_list, reward_list = [], [], []
    isopen = True
    for i in range(1):
        obs = env.reset()
        total_reward = 0.0
        steps = 0
        restart = False
        while True:
            # obs = preprocess(obs)  # from shape (96, 96, 3) to (28*32,)
            # obs_list.append(obs)
            action_list.append(a)

            s, r, done, info = env.step(a)
            reward_list.append(r)
            total_reward += r
            if steps % 1 == 0 or done:
                print("\naction " + str(["{:+0.2f}".format(x) for x in a]))
                print("step {} total_reward {:+0.2f}".format(steps, total_reward))
            steps += 1
            isopen = env.render()
            if done or restart or isopen == False:
                break
    return obs_list, action_list, reward_list
```

这部分是我人为完成决策的,然后进入正式训练;相比于智能体一开始随机行进,我觉得这个方法要快一些,并且效果也会更好一些,但是不太清楚要怎么将参数传给智能体?

title: [ValueError]关于在PG算法中使用监督学习的问题
body:
通过监督学习训练一个网络,根据obs输出act,但是sample()和predict()的feed里只有obs,我主动添加act后:
def sample(self, obs, act):
        place = fluid.CPUPlace() # 指明executor的执行场所
        x = fluid.data(name='obs', shape=[None, 4], dtype='float32') # 定义输入的形状和数据类型
        y = fluid.data(name='act', shape=[None, 1], dtype='float32') # 定义输出的形状和数据类型
        feeder = fluid.DataFeeder(place=place, feed_list=[x, y])

        # sample_model = fluid.io.load_persistables(fluid.Executor(fluid.CPUPlace()), "./sample_model", self.pred_program)
        # act_prob = sample_model.run(
        #     self.pred_program,
        #     feed={'obs': obs.astype('float32')},
        #     fetch_list=[self.act_prob])[0]
        act_prob = self.fluid_executor.run(
            self.pred_program,
            feed={'obs': obs.astype('float32'),
                  'act': act.astype('float32')},
            fetch_list=[self.act_prob])[0]
        # act_prob = np.squeeze(act_prob, axis=0)  # 减少一维维度
        # act = np.random.choice(range(self.act_dim), p=act_prob)  # 根据动作概率选取动作
        fluid.io.save_persistables(act_prob,"./sample_model")
        # return act

报错:
ValueError: var act not in this block

完整代码如下:
import parl
from parl import layers
import numpy as np
import paddle.fluid as fluid
import gym
import six
from parl.utils import logger
from parl.algorithms import PolicyGradient
from pyglet.window import key

class Model(parl.Model):
    def __init__(self, act_dim):
        act_dim = act_dim
        hid1_size = 256
        hid2_size = 64

        self.fc1 = layers.fc(size=hid1_size, act='relu')
        self.fc2 = layers.fc(size=hid2_size, act='relu')
        self.fc3 = layers.fc(size=act_dim, act='softmax')

    def forward(self, obs):
        h1 = self.fc1(obs)
        h2 = self.fc2(h1)
        out = self.fc3(h2)
        return out

class Agent(parl.Agent):
    def __init__(self, algorithm, obs_dim, act_dim):
        self.obs_dim = obs_dim
        self.act_dim = act_dim
        super(Agent, self).__init__(algorithm)

    def build_program(self):
        self.pred_program = fluid.Program()
        self.learn_program = fluid.Program()

        with fluid.program_guard(self.pred_program):  # 搭建计算图用于 预测动作，定义输入输出变量
            obs = layers.data(
                name='obs', shape=[self.obs_dim], dtype='float32')
            self.act_prob = self.alg.predict(obs)

        with fluid.program_guard(self.learn_program):  # 搭建计算图用于 更新policy网络，定义输入输出变量
            obs = layers.data(
                name='obs', shape=[self.obs_dim], dtype='float32')
            act = layers.data(name='act', shape=[1], dtype='int64')
            reward = layers.data(name='reward', shape=[], dtype='float32')
            self.cost = self.alg.learn(obs, act, reward)

    def sample(self, obs, act):
        place = fluid.CPUPlace() # 指明executor的执行场所
        x = fluid.data(name='obs', shape=[None, 4], dtype='float32') # 定义输入的形状和数据类型
        y = fluid.data(name='act', shape=[None, 1], dtype='float32') # 定义输出的形状和数据类型
        feeder = fluid.DataFeeder(place=place, feed_list=[x, y])

        # sample_model = fluid.io.load_persistables(fluid.Executor(fluid.CPUPlace()), "./sample_model", self.pred_program)
        # act_prob = sample_model.run(
        #     self.pred_program,
        #     feed={'obs': obs.astype('float32')},
        #     fetch_list=[self.act_prob])[0]
        act_prob = self.fluid_executor.run(
            self.pred_program,
            feed={'obs': obs.astype('float32'),
                  'act': act.astype('float32')},
            fetch_list=[self.act_prob])[0]
        # act_prob = np.squeeze(act_prob, axis=0)  # 减少一维维度
        # act = np.random.choice(range(self.act_dim), p=act_prob)  # 根据动作概率选取动作
        fluid.io.save_persistables(act_prob,"./sample_model")
        # return act

    def predict(self, obs):
        obs = np.expand_dims(obs, axis=0)
        # predict_model = fluid.io.load_persistables(fluid.Executor(fluid.CPUPlace()), "./sample_model", self.pred_program)
        # act_prob = predict_model.run(
        #     self.pred_program,
        #     feed={'obs': obs.astype('float32')},
        #     fetch_list=[self.act_prob])[0]
        act_prob = self.fluid_executor.run(
            self.pred_program,
            feed={'obs': obs.astype('float32')},
            fetch_list=[self.act_prob])[0]
        act_prob = np.squeeze(act_prob, axis=0)
        act = np.argmax(act_prob)  # 根据动作概率选择概率最高的动作
        return act

    def learn(self, obs, act, reward):
        act = np.expand_dims(act, axis=-1)
        feed = {
            'obs': obs.astype('float32'),
            'act': act.astype('int64'),
            'reward': reward.astype('float32')
        }
        # learn_model = fluid.io.load_persistables(fluid.Executor(fluid.CPUPlace()), "./sample_model", self.pred_program)
        # cost = learn_model.run(
        #     self.learn_program, feed=feed, fetch_list=[self.cost])[0]
        cost = self.fluid_executor.run(
            self.learn_program, feed=feed, fetch_list=[self.cost])[0]
        fluid.io.save_persistables(cost,"./learn_model")
        return cost


a = np.array([0.0, 0.0, 0.0])

def key_press(k, mod):
        global restart
        if k == 0xff0d: restart = True
        if k == key.LEFT:  a[0] = -1.0
        if k == key.RIGHT: a[0] = +1.0
        if k == key.UP:    a[1] = +1.0
        if k == key.DOWN:  a[2] = +0.8   # set 1.0 for wheels to block to zero rotation

def key_release(k, mod):
    if k == key.LEFT  and a[0] == -1.0: a[0] = 0
    if k == key.RIGHT and a[0] == +1.0: a[0] = 0
    if k == key.UP:    a[1] = 0
    if k == key.DOWN:  a[2] = 0

def WarnUp(env):
    env.render()
    env.viewer.window.on_key_press = key_press
    env.viewer.window.on_key_release = key_release
    obs_list, action_list, reward_list = [], [], []
    lists = []
    isopen = True
    for i in range(1):
        obs = env.reset()
        total_reward = 0.0
        steps = 0
        restart = False
        while True:
            obs_list.append(obs)
            action_list.append(a)

            s, r, done, info = env.step(a)
            reward_list.append(r)
            total_reward += r
            if steps % 1 == 0 or done:
                print("\naction " + str(["{:+0.2f}".format(x) for x in a]))
                print("step {} total_reward {:+0.2f}".format(steps, total_reward))
            steps += 1
            isopen = env.render()
            if done or restart or isopen == False:
                break
    lists = [obs_list, action_list, reward_list]
    np.save("data_3.npy",lists)
    # return obs_list, action_list, reward_list

def preprocess(image): # input 96*96*3 output 28*32
    image = image[:84]
    image = image[::3,::3,]

    # grass to black
    mask = np.all(image == [102, 229, 102], axis=2)
    image[mask] = [0, 0, 0]
    mask = np.all(image == [102, 204, 102], axis=2)
    image[mask] = [0, 0, 0]

    image = image[:, :, 0]
    image[image != 0] = 1  # 转为灰度图，除了黑色外其他都是白色

    return image.astype(np.float).ravel()

def convert_action(action):
    # print(action)
    if 0 == action:
        action = [ 0.0, 1.0, 0.0] # STRAIGHT
        return action
    elif 1 == action:
        action = [ 1.0, 0.0, 0.0] # RIGHT
        return action
    elif 2 == action:
        action = [-1.0, 0.0, 0.0] # LEFT
        return action
    elif 3 == action:
        action = [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] # Keep
        return action
    else:
        print("action error")

def train(agent):
    feature_names = ['straight', 'left', 'right', 'keep']
    feature_num = len(feature_names)
    lists = []
    obs_lists = []
    act_lists = []
    for i in range(1,4):
        list = np.load("data_%d.npy"%i)
        # print(len(list[0]))
        # print(len(list[1]))
        for j in range(len(list[0])):
            obs = list[0][j]
            obs = preprocess(obs)  # from shape (96, 96, 3) to (28*32,)
            obs = np.expand_dims(obs, axis=0)  # 增加一维维度
            obs_lists.append(obs)
            act = list[1][j]
            act_lists.append([obs, act])

    lists = [obs_lists, act_lists]
    data = np.array(lists)


    for i in range(len(data[0])):
        obs = data[0][i]
        act = data[0][i]
        agent.sample(obs, act)


def main():
    LEARNING_RATE = 1e-3
    # env = gym.make('CarRacing-v0')
    # WarnUp(env)
    obs_dim = 28 * 32
    act_dim = 4 # simply straight left and right and keep
    logger.info('obs_dim {}, act_dim {}'.format(obs_dim, act_dim))

    # 根据parl框架构建agent
    model = Model(act_dim=act_dim)
    alg = PolicyGradient(model, lr=LEARNING_RATE)
    agent = Agent(alg, obs_dim=obs_dim, act_dim=act_dim)

    train(agent)



if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

其中, .npy 文件保存了人为在环境操作的obs,act以及reward
在强化学习中使用监督学习有些困难,想问一下PARL有案例吗?
或者说,以上问题我该如何解决?谢谢!

title: 并行训练中Actor访问不到模块
body:
程序在一个强化学习环境（MaCA）的train/abc/下，在该环境的根目录下面执行程序。
environment/：推演环境
　　　interface.py：环境调用接口
agent/：用于存储封装好的可直接调用的智能体决策代码，每个决策代码可单独设立一个文件夹，按照标准封装，系统直接调用
　　　fix_rule/：基于规则的同构异构对抗决策算法
　　　fix_rule_no_att/：基于规则的同构异构对抗决策算法（无攻击能力）
　　　simple/：基于DQN的同构对抗决策示例算法，需使用pytorch
obs_construct/：观测值组织形式自定义，开发者可根据算法需要自定义obs结构
　　　simple/：基于DQN的同构对抗决策示例对应的obs组织
fight_mp.py：对抗调度程序
replay.py 日志回放入口程序
maps/：对抗场景库
　　　1000_1000_2_10_vs_2_10.map：预置异构对抗场景
　　　1000_1000_fighter10v10.map：预置同构对抗场景
configuration/：配置数据
　　　reward.py：部分预置回报检查点的赋值
　　　system.py：部分系统推演规则定义
train/：决策算法训练所在路径
　　　simple/：simple决策模型训练代码

Actor部分程序如下：
```
from train.abc.maca_agent import MaCA_Agent
```

原始代码：
```
import os
import gym
import argparse
import random
import collections
import numpy as np

import paddle.fluid as fluid
import parl
from parl import layers
from parl.utils import logger
from parl.algorithms import DDQN

parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
parser.add_argument('--model', default='', help=r'预训练模型的序号，默认不使用')
parser.add_argument('--lr', type=float, default=5e-4, help=r'学习率')
parser.add_argument('--max_episode', type=int, default=3000, help=r'最多跑多少个episode')
parser.add_argument('--learn_freq', type=int, default=5, help=r'训练频率，每若干次交互训练一次')
parser.add_argument('--memory_size', type=int, default=20000, help=r'replay memory的大小')
parser.add_argument('--memory_warmup_size', type=int, default=200, help='replay_memory中预存的经验数目')
parser.add_argument('--batch_size', type=int, default=32, help=r'mini-batch的大小')
parser.add_argument('--gamma', type=float, default=0.999, help=r'折扣因子')

opt = parser.parse_args()
print(opt)

class CartpoleModel(parl.Model):
    def __init__(self, act_dim):
        hid1_size = 128
        hid2_size = 128
        self.fc1 = layers.fc(size=hid1_size, act='relu')
        self.fc2 = layers.fc(size=hid2_size, act='relu')
        self.fc3 = layers.fc(size=act_dim, act=None)

    def value(self, obs):
        h1 = self.fc1(obs)
        h2 = self.fc2(h1)
        Q = self.fc3(h2)
        return Q

class CartpoleAgent(parl.Agent):
    def __init__(self, algorithm, obs_dim, act_dim, e_greed=0.1, e_greed_decrement=0):
        assert isinstance(obs_dim, int)
        assert isinstance(act_dim, int)
        self.obs_dim = obs_dim
        self.act_dim = act_dim
        super(CartpoleAgent, self).__init__(algorithm)

        self.global_step = 0
        self.update_target_steps = 200  # 每隔200个training steps再把model的参数复制到target_model中

        self.e_greed = e_greed  # 有一定概率随机选取动作，探索
        self.e_greed_decrement = e_greed_decrement  # 随着训练逐步收敛，探索的程度慢慢降低

    def build_program(self):
        self.pred_program = fluid.Program()
        self.learn_program = fluid.Program()

        with fluid.program_guard(self.pred_program):
            obs = layers.data(
                name='obs', shape=[self.obs_dim], dtype='float32')
            self.value = self.alg.predict(obs)

        with fluid.program_guard(self.learn_program):
            obs = layers.data(
                name='obs', shape=[self.obs_dim], dtype='float32')
            act = layers.data(name='act', shape=[1], dtype='int64')
            reward = layers.data(name='reward', shape=[], dtype='float32')
            next_obs = layers.data(
                name='next_obs', shape=[self.obs_dim], dtype='float32')
            terminal = layers.data(name='terminal', shape=[], dtype='bool')
            self.cost = self.alg.learn(obs, act, reward, next_obs, terminal)

    def sample(self, obs):
        sample = np.random.rand()  # 产生0~1之间的小数
        if sample < self.e_greed:
            act = np.random.randint(self.act_dim)  # 探索：每个动作都有概率被选择
        else:
            act = self.predict(obs)  # 选择最优动作
        self.e_greed = max(0.01, self.e_greed - self.e_greed_decrement)  # 随着训练逐步收敛，探索的程度慢慢降低
        return act

    def predict(self, obs):  # 选择最优动作
        obs = np.expand_dims(obs, axis=0)
        pred_Q = self.fluid_executor.run(
            self.pred_program,
            feed={'obs': obs.astype('float32')},
            fetch_list=[self.value])[0]
        pred_Q = np.squeeze(pred_Q, axis=0)
        act = np.argmax(pred_Q)  # 选择Q最大的下标，即对应的动作
        return act

    def learn(self, obs, act, reward, next_obs, terminal):
        # 每隔200个training steps同步一次model和target_model的参数
        if self.global_step % self.update_target_steps == 0:
            self.alg.sync_target()
        self.global_step += 1

        act = np.expand_dims(act, -1)
        feed = {
            'obs': obs.astype('float32'),
            'act': act.astype('int32'),
            'reward': reward,
            'next_obs': next_obs.astype('float32'),
            'terminal': terminal,
        }
        cost = self.fluid_executor.run(
            self.learn_program, feed=feed, fetch_list=[self.cost])[0]  # 训练一次网络
        return cost

class ReplayMemory(object):
    def __init__(self, max_size):
        self.buffer = collections.deque(maxlen=max_size)

    # 增加一条经验到经验池中
    def append(self, exp):
        self.buffer.append(exp)

    # 从经验池中选取N条经验出来
    def sample(self, batch_size):
        mini_batch = random.sample(self.buffer, batch_size)
        obs_batch, action_batch, reward_batch, next_obs_batch,done_batch = [], [], [], [], []

        for experience in mini_batch:
            s, a, r, s_p,done = experience
            obs_batch.append(s)
            action_batch.append(a)
            reward_batch.append(r)
            next_obs_batch.append(s_p)
            done_batch.append(done)

        return np.array(obs_batch).astype('float32'), \
            np.array(action_batch).astype('float32'), np.array(reward_batch).astype('float32'),\
            np.array(next_obs_batch).astype('float32'), np.array(done_batch).astype('float32')

    def __len__(self):
        return len(self.buffer)

# 训练一个episode
def run_episode(env, agent, rpm):
    total_reward = 0
    obs = env.reset()
    step = 0
    while True:
        step += 1
        action = agent.sample(obs)
        next_obs, reward, done, _ = env.step(action)
        rpm.append((obs, action, reward, next_obs, done))

        # train model
        if (len(rpm) > opt.memory_warmup_size) and (step % opt.learn_freq == 0):
            (batch_obs, batch_action, batch_reward, batch_next_obs,
             batch_done) = rpm.sample(opt.batch_size)
            train_loss = agent.learn(batch_obs, batch_action, batch_reward,
                                     batch_next_obs, batch_done)

        total_reward += reward
        obs = next_obs
        if done:
            break
    return total_reward


# 评估 agent, 跑 5 个episode，总reward求平均
def evaluate(env, agent, num_episodes=5, render=False):
    eval_reward = []
    for i in range(num_episodes):
        obs = env.reset()
        episode_reward = 0
        while True:
            action = agent.predict(obs)
            obs, reward, done, _ = env.step(action)
            episode_reward += reward
            if render:
                env.render()
            if done:
                break
        eval_reward.append(episode_reward)
    return np.mean(eval_reward)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    env = gym.make('CartPole-v1')
    # env = env.unwrapped # Cancel the minimum score limit
    obs_dim = env.observation_space.shape[0]
    act_dim = env.action_space.n
    logger.info('obs_dim {}, act_dim {}'.format(obs_dim, act_dim))

    # 根据parl框架构建agent
    rpm = ReplayMemory(opt.memory_size)
    model = CartpoleModel(act_dim=act_dim)
    alg = DDQN(model, act_dim=act_dim, gamma=opt.gamma, lr=opt.lr)
    agent = CartpoleAgent(
        alg,
        obs_dim=obs_dim,
        act_dim=act_dim,
        e_greed=0.1,  # explore
        e_greed_decrement=1e-6
    )  # probability of exploring is decreasing during training

    # 加载模型
    if os.path.exists('./models/ddqn_{}.ckpt'.format(opt.model)):
        agent.restore('./models/ddqn_{}.ckpt'.format(opt.model))
        RUN_NEXT_EPISODE = 'T'
        while RUN_NEXT_EPISODE == 'T':
            reward = evaluate(env, agent, num_episodes=1, render=True)
            print("Reward is: {}".format(reward))
            RUN_NEXT_EPISODE = input('Input T or N: ')
        exit()

    while len(rpm) < opt.memory_warmup_size:  # warm up replay memory
        run_episode(env, agent, rpm)

    # 评估一下初始模型
    total_reward = evaluate(env, agent)
    logger.info('Test reward: {}'.format(total_reward))
    agent.save('./models/ddqn_{}.ckpt'.format(0))
    for i in range(opt.max_episode):
        total_reward = run_episode(env, agent, rpm)
        if i % 10 == 0:
            logger.info("Episode {}, Reward Sum {}.".format(
                i, total_reward))

        if (i + 1) % 100 == 0:
            total_reward = evaluate(env, agent)
            logger.info('Test reward: {}'.format(total_reward))
            agent.save('./models/ddqn_{}.ckpt'.format(i + 1))

    # # save the parameters to ./model.ckpt
    # agent.save('./model.ckpt')
```

title: BicNet算法复现，双向lstm网络有问题
body:
有没有复现BicNet算法的计划，我自己在尝试写BicNet算法的时候发现paddlepaddle的双向lstm接口有问题。

title: Fail to return model weights by using model.get_weights()
body:
Version:
paddlepaddle==1.6.2
parl==1.3.1

Code:
```
import parl
import paddle.fluid as fluid
from parl import layers

class CartpoleModel(parl.Model):
    def __init__(self, act_dim):
        hid_size = 8
        self.fc1 = layers.fc(size=hid_size, act='relu')
        self.fc2 = layers.fc(size=act_dim, act=None)

    def value(self, obs):
        h = self.fc1(obs)
        Q = self.fc2(h)
        return Q

action_dim = 2
model = CartpoleModel(act_dim=action_dim)
model.get_weights()
```

Error:

```
AssertionError: Cannot find fc.b_32 in scope. Perhaps you need to make the variable persistable by using var.persistable = True in your program.
```

The code as followed:

```python
import parl
import threading
import time, os

@parl.remote_class
class parlTest():
    def run(self):
        ans = 0
        for i in range(100000000):
            ans += i
        print(ans)

    def long_time_task(self, name):
    
        print('Run task %s (%s)...' % (name, os.getpid()))
    
        threads = []
        for i in range(1):
            t = threading.Thread(target=self.run, name='LoopThread%d'%(i))
            t.start()
            threads.append(t)

        for t in threads:
            t.join()
```

... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...



main.py
... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...... ...
```python
import time, os
import threading
from multiprocessing import Pool

from absl import app
from absl import flags
from absl import logging

from yours.Module import parlTest
import parl

FlAGS = flags.FLAGS
flags.DEFINE_integer('mode', 0, 'Runing mode')
flags.DEFINE_integer('task_num', 4, 'number of task')

class Test():
    def run(self):
        ans = 0
        for i in range(100000000):
            ans += i

    def long_time_task(self, name):
    
        print('Run task %s (%s)...' % (name, os.getpid()))
    
        threads = []
        for i in range(1):
            t = threading.Thread(target=self.run, name='LoopThread%d'%(i))
            t.start()
            threads.append(t)

        for t in threads:
            t.join()

def main(argv):

    del argv

    if FlAGS.mode == 0:
        print("Enable Multiprocessing with PARL ... ...")
        parl.connect("10.1.14.249:36000")
        test = parlTest()
        print('Parent process %s.' % os.getpid())
        start = time.clock()
        p = Pool(FlAGS.task_num)
        for i in range(FlAGS.task_num):
            p.apply_async(test.long_time_task, args=(i,))
    
        print('Waiting for all subprocesses done...')
        p.close()
        p.join()
        end = time.clock()
        print('All subprocesses done.')
        print("Total cost time %f seconds"%(end - start))
    
    elif FlAGS.mode == 1:
        print("Enable Multiprocessing without PARL ... ...")
        test = Test()
        print('Parent process %s.' % os.getpid())
        start = time.clock()
        p = Pool(FlAGS.task_num)
        for i in range(FlAGS.task_num):
            p.apply_async(test.long_time_task, args=(i,))
    
        print('Waiting for all subprocesses done...')
        p.close()
        p.join()
        end = time.clock()
        print('All subprocesses done.')
        print("Total cost time %f seconds"%(end - start))

    elif FlAGS.mode == 2:
        print("Enable Multithreading with PARL ... ...")
        parl.connect("10.1.14.249:36000")
        test = parlTest()
        start = time.clock()
        threads = []
        for _ in range(FlAGS.task_num):
            th = threading.Thread(target=test.run)
            th.start()
            threads.append(th)

        end = time.clock()
        for th in threads:
            th.join()

        print("Total cost time %f seconds"%(end - start))
    
    elif FlAGS.mode == 3:
        print("Enable Multithreading without PARL ... ...")
        test = Test()
        start = time.clock()
        threads = []
        for _ in range(FlAGS.task_num):
            th = threading.Thread(target=test.run)
            th.start()
            threads.append(th)

        end = time.clock()
        for th in threads:
            th.join()

        print("Total cost time %f seconds"%(end - start))

    elif FlAGS.mode == 4:
        print("Enable Serial calculations with PARL ... ...")
        parl.connect("10.1.14.249:36000")
        test = parlTest()
        start = time.clock()
        for _ in range(FlAGS.task_num):
            test.run()
        end = time.clock()

        print("Total cost time %f seconds"%(end - start))

    elif FlAGS.mode == 5:
        print("Enable Serial calculations without PARL ... ...")
        test = Test()
        start = time.clock()
        for _ in range(FlAGS.task_num):
            test.run()
        end = time.clock()

        print("Total cost time %f seconds"%(end - start))
    
    else:
        print("Does not have such mode!!!")

 
if __name__=='__main__':
    app.run(main)

```

title: 为何parl中的网络可以不用输入input参数?
body:
如SAC算法中：
```
class ActorModel(parl.Model):
    def __init__(self, act_dim):
        hid1_size = 400
        hid2_size = 300

        self.fc1 = layers.fc(size=hid1_size, act='relu')
        self.fc2 = layers.fc(size=hid2_size, act='relu')
        self.mean_linear = layers.fc(size=act_dim)
        self.log_std_linear = layers.fc(size=act_dim)

    def policy(self, obs):
        hid1 = self.fc1(obs)
        hid2 = self.fc2(hid1)
        means = self.mean_linear(hid2)
        log_std = self.log_std_linear(hid2)
        log_std = layers.clip(log_std, min=LOG_SIG_MIN, max=LOG_SIG_MAX)

        return means, log_std
```
这里的`layers.fc`都不用输入`input`参数的，但是看了下`parl.layers`不就是继承的`paddle.fluid.layers`么，为何在其他地方实验行不通呢？

title: [xparl] support running paddle in actors with GPU.
body: The main issue is that paddle cannot run in the subprocess.

title: [AssertionError]: the action should be in range [-1.0, 1.0]
body:
PPO 的 example 中，train.py 文件中，run_evaluate_episode 函数需要加上 action = np.clip(action, -1.0, 1.0)，否则有可能出现超过范围的情况导致程序运行失败。
另外，建议可以在里面加上中间阶段进行模型保存的语句，否则整个训练过程很长，如果由于中间断掉要从头开始很可惜。

title: Inconsistency issue in function **evaluate**
[xparl] check the version consistence
body:
We should check the version consistence among the worker, master and the client.
Inconsistent versions may cause problems. Users should be warned in this situation.

title: [teamcity] support windows environment
[xparl] the high computation load may cause the heartbeat detection fail in job
[teamcity] the unittest sometimes gets stuck
[xparl] support distribution of all the files in the folder
body: XPARL doesn't support distributing a folder now. It would be more convenient if we support this feature.

title: Alpha Zero plays same games on each thread.
body:
Each thread is run with the same seed which means that all the games are the same.
This is then the same as running it in single threaded, but it could also bias the network.

title: [xparl] set the random seed when creating jobs
body:
To avoid using the same random seed when creating jobs at the same time, we should set different random seeds for different jobs.

For example:

```python
numpy.random.seed(job_id)
random.seed(job_id)
```

这个文件的代码中只看到了 'KLPEN' 的部分，请问 'CLIP' 部分是在哪里实现的呢？
```
def policy_learn(self, obs, actions, advantages):
        """ Learn policy:
        1. Sync parameters of policy model to old policy model
        2. Fix old policy model, and learn policy model multi times
        3. if use KLPEN loss, Adjust kl loss coefficient: beta
        """
        self.alg.sync_old_policy()

        all_loss, all_kl = [], []
        for _ in range(self.policy_learn_times):
            loss, kl = self._batch_policy_learn(obs, actions, advantages)
            all_loss.append(loss)
            all_kl.append(kl)

        if self.loss_type == 'KLPEN':
            # Adative KL penalty coefficient
            if kl > self.kl_targ * 2:
                self.beta = 1.5 * self.beta
            elif kl < self.kl_targ / 2:
                self.beta = self.beta / 1.5

        return np.mean(all_loss), np.mean(all_kl)

```

title: [dygraph] set weights with wrong params shape should report an error
body:
When loading parameters, paddle2.0 will skip the parameters of the wrong shape and just throw a warning. PARL will add patchs to prevent this kind of situation and report an error

Please note that this patch should be removed after paddle2.0 fixed it.


pip install paddlepaddle==2.0.0rc0
```
import numpy as np
import paddle
import paddle.nn as nn
import paddle.optimizer as opt

class LinearNet(nn.Layer):
    def __init__(self):
        super(LinearNet, self).__init__()
        self.fc1 = nn.Linear(4, 3)
        self.fc2 = nn.Linear(3, 2)

    def forward(self, x):
        out = self.fc1(x)
        out = self.fc2(out)
        return out

mylayer = LinearNet()
print(mylayer)


params = mylayer.state_dict()
print(params)
print('------------')

params['fc1.weight'] = params['fc1.bias'] # wrong shape
params['fc2.bias'] += 1 # other param modified

mylayer.set_state_dict(params)

params = mylayer.state_dict()
print(params)
print('------------')
```

这个是我基于DDPG模型写的代码，包括了游戏的环境，只需要安装pygame就可以运行，麻烦帮我看看是那里出了问题，随着训练，模型输出的结果不是只会往上飞， 就是玩下飞。 
[temp2.zip](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PARL/files/5565154/temp2.zip)

其中在训练时对输出的结果这样处理，正常的动作不是0就是1，我通过这样方式取整可以的吗，有没有错？
```python
        # 预测动作
        action = agent.predict(obs.astype('float32'))

        # 利用高斯分布添加噪声
        action = np.clip(np.random.normal(action, 1.0), -1.0, 1.0)
        # 获取动作，把结果固定输出在(-1, 1)，取整就得到了动作
        action = int(action_mapping(action, -1.0, 1.0) + 1 - 1e-4)

        # 把动作标签转换为实际的游戏动作
        next_obs, reward, terminal = env.step(action)
        next_obs = preprocess(next_obs, render)
```

title: examples中NeurIPS2019的可视化
body: 您好，NeurIPS2019-Learn-to-Move-Challenge项目中，final_submit下的test.py如何在运行期间调用可视化窗口？类似gym的env.render()。我查看了osim-rl里面osim.py的OsimEnv类虽然定义了render方法但是内容为空，导致调用env.render()无任何输出，或者有其它方法可以实现可视化？

title: How to build model with CNN+RNN in PARL?
body:
Recently I want to give a try on DRQN algorithm,which use CNN+RNN as model, to play FPS game.
However,I can't figure out how to use api like Variable in tensorflow or torch as a global variable or a memory block to make the agent's actions be a sequence.

title: override fluid.program_guard for parl.Agent
body:
In this case, only agent2 could load its parameters successfully. 
```python
agent1 = Agent()
agent1.restore('model1.ckpt')
agent2 = Agent()
agent2.restore('model2.ckpt')
```
and now it is able to load parameters successfully for both agents in the following manner,
```python
agent1 = Agent()
agent2 = Agent()
agent1.restore('model1.ckpt')
agent2.restore('model2.ckpt')
```
### Problem
- The problem is caused by the `default_startup_program` in `parl.Agent`

title: [performance comparison] memory usage
body:
When I tried to reproduce the experimental results of OAC, I found that rllib uses much larger memory than the non-parallel version. 
I think that xparl doesn't require much additional memory for distributed computation.
This could be a major feature for xparl.
We should test the memory usage for both frameworks and add the result in our introduction.

title: [xparl] the monitor service doesn't stop automatically after the master shutdown.
body:
To duplicate the error:
```shell
xparl start --port 8010 --monitor_port 8020
kill the process of master
xparl start --port 8010 --monitor_port 8020
```
Then xparl prints the error that monitor port has been used.

title: 模型无法收敛，感觉是梯度无法传播导致的
body:
[DDPG.zip](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PARL/files/5695297/DDPG.zip)
我自己搭了一个扫雷的gym环境，mines.py文件在gym的classic_control目录中，用的是python原生的minesweeper库，try.py历经艰辛终于能跑了，但模型始终无法收敛。调试发现是agent一直在点击同一个扫雷点，我给每次点击同一点施加了-1000的reward,并改成每step一次都learn一次，但还是没用。

title: No module named 'xparl_test'
body:
### Case
I tried to build a Remote Mujoco env wrapper, and write a class to pass env's data(mainly action_space & observation_space).
But I got the following error.
+ Dependencies are the same: Linux, parl=1.4

## Error:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/76139596/103097740-3623c880-4643-11eb-95c6-4e4361266597.png)

## Code
```
import gym
import parl
class ActionSpace(object):
    def __init__(self, low, high, shape=None):
        super(ActionSpace, self).__init__()
        self.low = low
        self.high = high
        self.shape = shape

@parl.remote_class
class RemoteEnv(object):
    def __init__(self, env_name=None):
        super(RemoteEnv, self).__init__()
        self.env = gym.make(env_name)
        self.action_space = ActionSpace(self.env.action_space.low,
                                        self.env.action_space.high,
                                        self.env.action_space.shape)

parl.connect('localhost')
env = RemoteEnv(env_name='HalfCheetah-v1')
action_dim = env.action_space.shape[0]
print(action_dim, max_action)
```

title: [backend] Support the environment variable for backend
body:
PARL supports different deep learning frameworks now. Sometimes people have installed several frameworks but they want to use the specified framework.
To meet this requirement, we refer to what Keras did at supporting multiple frameworks. 
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42177658/how-to-switch-backend-with-keras-from-tensorflow-to-theano

title: 三个问题,什么时候支持paddlepaddle2

一、什么时候支持paddlepaddle2,哪怕是2.0.0rc1，因为GPU问题，要新版本
二、什么时候有https://parl.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html，这样的中文说明文档，
github自带的中文文档没有英文版详细，是不重视中国的开发人员？
三、百度AI社区没有PARL，是不重视PARL？有没交流QQ群？

title: Add creating and using two xparl cluster in one unittest case
periodical integrity test
body:
The integrity test has some potential problems. It cannot guarantee that the latest code can run correctly.
For example, the developer A and B modify the code based on the version `V0` at the same time.
Then A submits the PR1 and B submits the PR2.
Both PRs can pass the unit tests, and they can be merged into the master branch.
But some bugs occur when their modifications are combined, which cannot be detected by our integrity test.

One of the solutions to this issue is to run the integrity test periodically.

`self.model.sync_weights_to(self.target_model) `

貌似是说 self.model 的参数在 self.target_model 中不存在
可是是target_model是从model deepcopy来的，如下： 
`self.target_model = copy.deepcopy(model)   `

the code:
`self.model.sync_weights_to(self.target_model) `
generate error：
`KeyError: 'Unable to find the variable:fc.b_0. Synchronize paramsters before initialization or attr_name does not exist.'  `
however the target_model define as follow:
`self.target_model = copy.deepcopy(model)   `
How can i solve it？

title: 四轮飞行器的代码2.0版本升级出现问题
body:
我在复现飞行器的代码的时候出现了下面的问题：
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 128, in <module>
    train_reward, steps = run_episode(env, agent, rpm)
  File "train.py", line 69, in run_episode
    batch_next_obs, batch_terminal)
  File "/Users/wugaosheng/Documents/baidu/RL/ddpg_quadrotor/quadrotor_agent.py", line 54, in learn
    critic_loss, actor_loss=self.alg.learn(obs, action, reward, next_obs, terminal)
  File "/Users/wugaosheng/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/parl/algorithms/paddle/ddpg.py", line 59, in learn
    terminal)
  File "/Users/wugaosheng/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/parl/algorithms/paddle/ddpg.py", line 69, in _critic_learn
    next_obs, self.target_model.actor_model(next_obs))
  File "/Users/wugaosheng/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/paddle/fluid/dygraph/layers.py", line 902, in __call__
    outputs = self.forward(*inputs, **kwargs)
  File "/Users/wugaosheng/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/paddle/fluid/dygraph/layers.py", line 920, in forward
    raise NotImplementedError
NotImplementedError
```
我的代码为：
```
import parl
from paddle.nn import Linear
# from paddle.fluid import layers
import paddle.nn.functional as F
import paddle.nn as nn
import paddle

class ActorModel(parl.Model):
    def __init__(self, input_shape,act_dim):
        super(ActorModel, self).__init__()
        hidden_dim_1, hidden_dim_2 = 64, 64
        self.fc1 = nn.Linear(input_shape,hidden_dim_1)
        self.fc2=nn.Linear(hidden_dim_1,hidden_dim_2)
        self.fc3=nn.Linear(hidden_dim_2,act_dim)

    def policy(self, obs):
        x = F.tanh(self.fc1(obs))
        x = F.tanh(self.fc2(x))
        return self.fc3(x)

class CriticModel(parl.Model):
    def __init__(self):
        super(CriticModel, self).__init__()
        hidden_dim_1, hidden_dim_2 = 64, 64
        self.fc1 = nn.Linear(64,hidden_dim_1)
        self.f2=nn.Linear(hidden_dim_1,hidden_dim_2)
        self.f3=nn.Linear(hidden_dim_2,1)

    def value(self, obs, act):
        x = F.tanh(self.fc1(obs))
        concat=paddle.concat([x, act], axis=1)
        x = F.tanh(self.fc2(concat))
        Q = F.tanh(self.fc3(x))
        Q=paddle.squeeze(Q, axis=1)
        return Q


class QuadrotorModel(parl.Model):
    def __init__(self, act_dim):
        super(QuadrotorModel, self).__init__()
        self.actor_model = ActorModel(16,act_dim)
        self.critic_model = CriticModel()

    def policy(self, obs):
        return self.actor_model.policy(obs)

    def value(self, obs, act):
        return self.critic_model.value(obs, act)

    def get_actor_params(self):
        return self.actor_model.parameters()

    def get_critic_params(self):
        return self.critic_model.parameters()

```
```
import numpy as np
import parl
# from parl import layers
# from paddle.fluid import layers
# from paddle import fluid
import paddle

class QuadrotorAgent(parl.Agent):
    def __init__(self, algorithm, obs_dim, act_dim=4):
        # assert isinstance(obs_dim, int)
        # assert isinstance(act_dim, int)
        super(QuadrotorAgent, self).__init__(algorithm)
        self.obs_dim = obs_dim
        self.act_dim = act_dim
        self.alg.sync_target(decay=0)

    def sample(self, obs):
        obs = paddle.to_tensor(obs.reshape(1, -1), dtype='float32')
        action, _ = self.alg.sample(obs)
        action_numpy = action.cpu().numpy()[0]
        return action_numpy

    def predict(self, obs):
        obs = paddle.to_tensor(obs.reshape(1, -1), dtype='float32')
        action = self.alg.predict(obs)
        action_numpy = action.cpu().numpy()[0]
        return action_numpy

    def learn(self, obs, action, reward, next_obs, terminal):
        terminal = np.expand_dims(terminal, -1)
        reward = np.expand_dims(reward, -1)

        obs = paddle.to_tensor(obs, dtype='float32')
        action = paddle.to_tensor(action, dtype='float32')
        reward = paddle.to_tensor(reward, dtype='float32')
        next_obs = paddle.to_tensor(next_obs, dtype='float32')
        terminal = paddle.to_tensor(terminal, dtype='float32')
        critic_loss, actor_loss=self.alg.learn(obs, action, reward, next_obs, terminal)
        return critic_loss, actor_loss 

```
```
import os
import numpy as np

import parl
# from parl import layers
# from paddle import fluid
from parl.utils import logger

# from parl.utils import action_mapping  # 将神经网络输出映射到对应的 实际动作取值范围 内
from parl.utils import ReplayMemory  # 经验回放

from rlschool import make_env  # 使用 RLSchool 创建飞行器环境
from quadrotor_model import QuadrotorModel
from quadrotor_agent import QuadrotorAgent
from parl.algorithms import DDPG
from parl.env.continuous_wrappers import ActionMappingWrapper

GAMMA = 0.99  # reward 的衰减因子，一般取 0.9 到 0.999 不等
TAU = 0.001  # target_model 跟 model 同步参数 的 软更新参数
ACTOR_LR = 0.0002  # Actor网络更新的 learning rate
CRITIC_LR = 0.001  # Critic网络更新的 learning rate
MEMORY_SIZE = 1e6  # replay memory的大小，越大越占用内存
MEMORY_WARMUP_SIZE = 1e4  # replay_memory 里需要预存一些经验数据，再从里面sample一个batch的经验让agent去learn
REWARD_SCALE = 0.01  # reward 的缩放因子
BATCH_SIZE = 256  # 每次给agent learn的数据数量，从replay memory随机里sample一批数据出来
TRAIN_TOTAL_STEPS = 1e6  # 总训练步数
TEST_EVERY_STEPS = 1e4  # 每个N步评估一下算法效果，每次评估5个episode求平均reward


def run_episode(env, agent, rpm):
    obs = env.reset()
    total_reward, steps = 0, 0
    while True:
        steps += 1
        batch_obs = np.expand_dims(obs, axis=0)
        action = agent.predict(batch_obs.astype('float32'))
        action = np.squeeze(action)

        # Add exploration noise, and clip to [-1.0, 1.0]
        action = np.clip(np.random.normal(action, 1.0), -1.0, 1.0)
        # action = action_mapping(action, env.action_space.low[0],
        #                         env.action_space.high[0])

        next_obs, reward, done, info = env.step(action)
        rpm.append(obs, action, REWARD_SCALE * reward, next_obs, done)
        # if(rpm.size()>BATCH_SIZE):
        #     print(rpm.sample_batch(BATCH_SIZE))
        #     break
        if rpm.size() > MEMORY_WARMUP_SIZE:
            batch_obs, batch_action, batch_reward, batch_next_obs, batch_terminal = rpm.sample_batch(BATCH_SIZE)
            # print(batch_obs)
            critic_loss, actor_loss  = agent.learn(batch_obs, batch_action, batch_reward,
                                      batch_next_obs, batch_terminal)

        obs = next_obs
        total_reward += reward

        if done:
            break
    return total_reward, steps


# 评估 agent, 跑 5 个episode，总reward求平均
def evaluate(env, agent, render=False):
    eval_reward = []
    for i in range(5):
        obs = env.reset()
        total_reward, steps = 0, 0
        while True:
            batch_obs = np.expand_dims(obs, axis=0)
            action = agent.predict(batch_obs.astype('float32'))
            action = np.squeeze(action)
            action = np.clip(action, -1.0, 1.0)  ## special
            # action = action_mapping(action, env.action_space.low[0],
            #                         env.action_space.high[0])
            # action = np.clip(action, -1.0, 1.0) ## special

            next_obs, reward, done, info = env.step(action)

            obs = next_obs
            total_reward += reward
            steps += 1

            if render:
                env.render()

            if done:
                break
        eval_reward.append(total_reward)
    return np.mean(eval_reward)


# 创建飞行器环境
env = make_env("Quadrotor", task="hovering_control")
# env = ActionMappingWrapper(env)
# env.reset()
obs_dim = env.observation_space.shape[0]
act_dim = env.action_space.shape[0]
logger.info('obs_dim {}, act_dim {}'.format(obs_dim, act_dim))

# 使用parl框架搭建Agent：QuadrotorModel, DDPG, QuadrotorAgent三者嵌套
model = QuadrotorModel(act_dim)
algorithm = DDPG(model, gamma=GAMMA, tau=TAU, actor_lr=ACTOR_LR, critic_lr=CRITIC_LR)
agent = QuadrotorAgent(algorithm, obs_dim, act_dim)

# parl库也为DDPG算法内置了ReplayMemory，可直接从 parl.utils 引入使用
rpm = ReplayMemory(int(MEMORY_SIZE), obs_dim, act_dim)

test_flag = 0
total_steps = 0
while total_steps < TRAIN_TOTAL_STEPS:
    train_reward, steps = run_episode(env, agent, rpm)
    total_steps += steps
    logger.info('Steps: {} Reward: {}'.format(total_steps, train_reward))

    if total_steps // TEST_EVERY_STEPS >= test_flag:
        while total_steps // TEST_EVERY_STEPS >= test_flag:
            test_flag += 1

        evaluate_reward = evaluate(env, agent,True)
        logger.info('Steps {}, Test reward: {}'.format(total_steps,evaluate_reward))

        # 保存模型
        ckpt = 'model_dir/steps_{}.ckpt'.format(total_steps)
        agent.save(ckpt)

```

title: 四轴飞行器代码升级到2.0以后没有收敛
body:
我把四轴飞行器的代码升级到了2.0，跑了一百万步以后reward还是很大，没有收敛，下面是我的代码：

```
import numpy as np
import parl
import paddle

class QuadrotorAgent(parl.Agent):
    def __init__(self, algorithm, obs_dim, act_dim=4):
        super(QuadrotorAgent, self).__init__(algorithm)
        self.obs_dim = obs_dim
        self.act_dim = act_dim
        self.alg.sync_target(decay=0)

    def sample(self, obs):
        obs = paddle.to_tensor(obs.reshape(1, -1), dtype='float32')
        action, _ = self.alg.sample(obs)
        action_numpy = action.cpu().numpy()[0]
        return action_numpy

    def predict(self, obs):
        obs = paddle.to_tensor(obs.reshape(1, -1), dtype='float32')
        action = self.alg.predict(obs)
        action_numpy = action.cpu().numpy()[0]
        return action_numpy

    def learn(self, obs, action, reward, next_obs, terminal):
        terminal = np.expand_dims(terminal, -1)
        reward = np.expand_dims(reward, -1)

        obs = paddle.to_tensor(obs, dtype='float32')
        action = paddle.to_tensor(action, dtype='float32')
        reward = paddle.to_tensor(reward, dtype='float32')
        next_obs = paddle.to_tensor(next_obs, dtype='float32')
        terminal = paddle.to_tensor(terminal, dtype='float32')
        # print(obs.shape)
        # print(action.shape)
        # print(reward.shape)
        # print(next_obs.shape)
        # print(terminal.shape)
        critic_loss, actor_loss=self.alg.learn(obs, action, reward, next_obs, terminal)
        return critic_loss, actor_loss 
```
```
import parl
from paddle.nn import Linear
import paddle.nn.functional as F
import paddle.nn as nn
import paddle

class ActorModel(parl.Model):
    def __init__(self, input_shape,act_dim):
        super(ActorModel, self).__init__()
        hidden_dim_1, hidden_dim_2 = 64, 64
        self.fc1 = nn.Linear(input_shape,hidden_dim_1)
        self.fc2=nn.Linear(hidden_dim_1,hidden_dim_2)
        self.fc3=nn.Linear(hidden_dim_2,act_dim)

    def forward(self, obs):
        x = F.tanh(self.fc1(obs))
        x = F.tanh(self.fc2(x))
        return self.fc3(x)

class CriticModel(parl.Model):
    def __init__(self):
        super(CriticModel, self).__init__()
        hidden_dim_1, hidden_dim_2 = 64, 64
        self.fc1 = nn.Linear(16,hidden_dim_1)
        self.fc2=nn.Linear(68,hidden_dim_2)
        self.fc3=nn.Linear(hidden_dim_2,1)

    def forward(self, obs, act):
        x = F.tanh(self.fc1(obs))
        concat=paddle.concat([x, act], axis=1)
        x = F.tanh(self.fc2(concat))
        Q = F.tanh(self.fc3(x))
        Q=paddle.squeeze(Q, axis=1)
        return Q


class QuadrotorModel(parl.Model):
    def __init__(self, act_dim):
        super(QuadrotorModel, self).__init__()
        self.actor_model = ActorModel(16,act_dim)
        self.critic_model = CriticModel()

    def policy(self, obs):
        return self.actor_model(obs)

    def value(self, obs, act):
        return self.critic_model(obs, act)

    def get_actor_params(self):
        return self.actor_model.parameters()

    def get_critic_params(self):
        return self.critic_model.parameters()
```

```
import os
import numpy as np

import parl
from parl.utils import logger

from parl.utils import ReplayMemory  # 经验回放

from rlschool import make_env  # 使用 RLSchool 创建飞行器环境
from quadrotor_model import QuadrotorModel
from quadrotor_agent import QuadrotorAgent
from parl.algorithms import DDPG
# from parl.env.continuous_wrappers import ActionMappingWrapper

GAMMA = 0.99  # reward 的衰减因子，一般取 0.9 到 0.999 不等
TAU = 0.001  # target_model 跟 model 同步参数 的 软更新参数
ACTOR_LR = 0.0002  # Actor网络更新的 learning rate
CRITIC_LR = 0.001  # Critic网络更新的 learning rate
MEMORY_SIZE = 1e6  # replay memory的大小，越大越占用内存
MEMORY_WARMUP_SIZE = 1e4  # replay_memory 里需要预存一些经验数据，再从里面sample一个batch的经验让agent去learn
REWARD_SCALE = 0.01  # reward 的缩放因子
BATCH_SIZE = 256  # 每次给agent learn的数据数量，从replay memory随机里sample一批数据出来
TRAIN_TOTAL_STEPS = 1e6  # 总训练步数
TEST_EVERY_STEPS = 1e4  # 每个N步评估一下算法效果，每次评估5个episode求平均reward


def run_train_episode(env, agent, rpm,render=False):
    obs = env.reset()
    total_reward, steps = 0, 0
    while True:
        steps += 1
        batch_obs = np.expand_dims(obs, axis=0)
        action = agent.predict(batch_obs.astype('float32'))
        action = np.squeeze(action)

        # Add exploration noise, and clip to [-1.0, 1.0]
        action = np.clip(np.random.normal(action, 1.0), -1.0, 1.0)
        # print(action)
        next_obs, reward, done, info = env.step(action)
        rpm.append(obs, action, REWARD_SCALE * reward, next_obs, done)
        if rpm.size() > MEMORY_WARMUP_SIZE:
            batch_obs, batch_action, batch_reward, batch_next_obs, batch_terminal = rpm.sample_batch(BATCH_SIZE)
            # print(batch_obs)
            critic_loss, actor_loss  = agent.learn(batch_obs, batch_action, batch_reward,batch_next_obs, batch_terminal)

        obs = next_obs
        total_reward += reward
        if render:
            env.render()
        if done:
            break
    return total_reward, steps


# 评估 agent, 跑 5 个episode，总reward求平均
def evaluate(env, agent, render=False):
    eval_reward = []
    for i in range(5):
        obs = env.reset()
        total_reward, steps = 0, 0
        while True:
            batch_obs = np.expand_dims(obs, axis=0)
            action = agent.predict(batch_obs.astype('float32'))
            action = np.squeeze(action)
            action = np.clip(action, -1.0, 1.0)  ## special
            next_obs, reward, done, info = env.step(action)

            obs = next_obs
            total_reward += reward
            steps += 1

            if render:
                env.render()

            if done:
                break
        eval_reward.append(total_reward)
    return np.mean(eval_reward)
    

def run_train():
    # 创建飞行器环境
    env = make_env("Quadrotor", task="hovering_control")
    # env = ActionMappingWrapper(env)
    env.reset()
    obs_dim = env.observation_space.shape[0]
    act_dim = env.action_space.shape[0]
    logger.info('obs_dim {}, act_dim {}'.format(obs_dim, act_dim))

    # 使用parl框架搭建Agent：QuadrotorModel, DDPG, QuadrotorAgent三者嵌套
    model = QuadrotorModel(act_dim)
    algorithm = DDPG(model, gamma=GAMMA, tau=TAU, actor_lr=ACTOR_LR, critic_lr=CRITIC_LR)
    agent = QuadrotorAgent(algorithm, obs_dim, act_dim)
    agent.restore("model_dir/steps_1000022.ckpt")
    # parl库也为DDPG算法内置了ReplayMemory，可直接从 parl.utils 引入使用
    rpm = ReplayMemory(int(MEMORY_SIZE), obs_dim, act_dim)

    test_flag = 0
    total_steps = 0
    render=True
    while total_steps < TRAIN_TOTAL_STEPS:
        train_reward, steps = run_train_episode(env, agent, rpm,render)
        total_steps += steps
        logger.info('Steps: {} Reward: {}'.format(total_steps, train_reward))

        if total_steps // TEST_EVERY_STEPS >= test_flag:
            while total_steps // TEST_EVERY_STEPS >= test_flag:
                test_flag += 1

            evaluate_reward = evaluate(env, agent,render)
            logger.info('Steps {}, Test reward: {}'.format(total_steps,evaluate_reward))

            # 保存模型
            ckpt = 'model_dir/steps_{}.ckpt'.format(total_steps)
            agent.save(ckpt)

def run_evaluate():
    render=True
    # 创建飞行器环境
    env = make_env("Quadrotor", task="hovering_control")
    env.reset()
    obs_dim = env.observation_space.shape[0]
    act_dim = env.action_space.shape[0]
    logger.info('obs_dim {}, act_dim {}'.format(obs_dim, act_dim))

    # 使用parl框架搭建Agent：QuadrotorModel, DDPG, QuadrotorAgent三者嵌套
    model = QuadrotorModel(act_dim)
    algorithm = DDPG(model, gamma=GAMMA, tau=TAU, actor_lr=ACTOR_LR, critic_lr=CRITIC_LR)
    agent = QuadrotorAgent(algorithm, obs_dim, act_dim)
    agent.restore("model_dir/steps_1000022.ckpt")
    # parl库也为DDPG算法内置了ReplayMemory，可直接从 parl.utils 引入使用
    rpm = ReplayMemory(int(MEMORY_SIZE), obs_dim, act_dim)
    evaluate_reward = evaluate(env, agent,render)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    run_train()
    # run_evaluate()
```

【xparl/bug】The master node will collapse while checking the cluster status.
body:
## How to reproduce the bug:

1.  start the master node.
2. add a new worker to the cluster.
3. check the cluster status by calling `xparl status`

## Why does the error occur?

The command `xparl status` must acquire the information of used CPUs in each worker. 
However, in the current implementation, the cluster has not stored the information while adding a new worker to the cluster.
As a result, the master node fail to find the key `used_cpu`.

title: 强化学习新手的几点小请求
body:
1.强化学习教程是用parl1写的代码，希望你们可以写一份parl2的代码，放在同样的教程项目中。要让你们重新录制一个内容差不多的parl2视频，估计你们一时半会也不会做的，那就弄份代码吧，各位大佬，这个请求对你们来说应该就是一天的精力而已吧。写几个代码比录视频容易多了吧，大佬们。parl我不清楚，但是paddlex，clas等等，他们的动态图版本，代码量比起静态图版本少了非常多，这非常有助于学者入门。说白了，动态图最牛逼的点还是在于进一步封装，代码量非常少，对新手非常友好。还有个叫做雨哥的大佬出过相关视频教程，让很多人知道了动态图封装性大幅提高。
2.谁都知道强化学习兴起，引起世界学者研究热潮一个很重要的时间点就是谷歌的阿尔法狗打败几个顶尖围棋的人类。现在最牛逼的棋类引擎主要是两种算法，一种是nnue+AB剪枝，一种是强化深度学习训练一个网络+mcts。围棋就属卡塔狗引擎最牛逼，有人把他改成五子棋，跳棋等各种棋类，五子棋使用2060训练一天，棋力就超过AB剪枝作者多年的心血。而且听说卡塔狗的算法比起阿尔法zero效率提高百倍以上，也就是相同训练时间，棋力 大幅提高。另一点，有人把卡塔狗改编成五子棋等其他棋类，基本只是改游戏规则，并不复杂，也是效果超群，希望你们可以研究下卡塔狗的论文和代码，引入他的算法，我相信，他的算法是很牛逼的，而且是经过实践证明的了。他的算法绝对不仅仅只能用于棋类，从五子棋引擎作者改编卡塔狗围棋引擎，并且效果超群就能看出来，这个强化学习算法泛化能力极强，而且效率，性能都非常牛逼，这才是你们应该优先引入的算法，毕竟这是世界第一的算法，通过实践证明了的。谷歌多少人研究相关算法，还不如一个小团队，这种算法不应该尽早引入我们的parl库吗？各位大佬们，可能这个请求比较耗费时间精力，跪求。要是有个算法，定义好规则，奖励机制，就可以在极短训练量情况下得到很牛逼的性能，这是强化学习梦寐以求的终极算法吧。据我所知，围棋引擎改编成五子棋引擎，主要也是修改规则而已，算法部分，无论是mcts，还是神经网络部分，都没有一丝改动，你们要是封装这个算法，让我们只需要定义一个规则，结果就很牛逼，那就爽歪歪了。

title: 新手建议和提问
body:
1.parl更新速度有点慢，希望加快更新速度，6个月都未必更新一次。
2.parl针对AlphaZero的四子棋案例，似乎缺少一个kaggle数据集，可以补上吗？parl似乎没有针对AlphaZero的算法实现封装，DQN等算法好像都实现了一定程度的封装，能封装一下AlphaZero算法吗？
3.那个学习教程，从第三课开始就有神经网络了。使用的都是几层全链接神经网络，参数大，速度慢，拟合效果应该也不如CNN等网络。我想问下，现在使用parl做强化学习，那步骤是不是针对具体项目选择parl中的某种算法，比如DQN还是DDPG等，假设选择了DQN算法，那就根据你们提供的DQNdemo例子，进行一些代码更改，然后就可以跑训练和推理了？这个步骤对吗？还是说有更好的步骤？还有一点疑问，你们例子中使用的神经网络结构都比较简单，如果我使用相同算法，但是使用了比较牛逼的神经网络，比如使用ResNet101代替demo中的几层小网络，是不是效果会好很多？我的意思是，相同训练资源情况下，相同训练时间的话，ResNet等比较深比较大的网络，在多数例子中，是不是比起很小的网络，比如2层全连接网络，得分更高，loss更小。
4.我之前提议，那个教程做个动态图代码，我经过测试，基本没什么问题，但我觉得代码量不少啊。我以前看过雨哥的高层API教学，一个很吸引我的关键点就在于动态图比起静态图少了很多代码，我想问问，对于parl来说，使用动态图版本，代码量会少很多吗？我觉得你们的封装程度还可以大幅度提高。
5.刚入门parl不久，我想知道，我目前要是有一个任务，我该选择哪种算法。我想知道哪种算法是SOTA。你们说你们得到很多强化学习的冠军，用的是什么算法？什么神经网络呢？

title: 新手提问：飞浆AI Sdudio强化学习DQN的几点疑惑
body:
这几天学习了科老师的百度强化学习课程，看到了DQN，有几点疑惑：

1. 视频中对倒立摆进行训练时，在训练效果展示的视频中，设置总episode为2000，但是当episode达到1800以后，test_reward反而没有之前好，科老师在视频中说“这种灾难性的结果是正常的”。 

自己很疑惑：为什么是正常的？是agent对环境探索得不够完全，所以导致学的模型不够好吗？虽然柯老师在视频中提到了不确定性，但是如果继续增加episode，test_reward会不会就不再发生这种“灾难性的结果”了？

如果无法避免这种“测试效果反而变差”的情况，那么确定最佳episode数，使得训练效果最好？

2. 自己的第2个问题是，如何确定DNQ中，Target_Q网络的网络层数和每一层网络的神经元个数？感觉在监督学习中，确定网络结构就需要花费很久时间调参。如果用网络来逼近Q表格，怎么能保证自己选择的网络是合适的呢？怎么才能知道自己训练的Target_Q网络，没有出现过拟合或者欠拟合的现象？

3. 自己的第3个问题是，在传统的表格型Q学习算法中，会不会出现第1个问题中的现象，训练效果随着episode增加反而下降？Q表格一定会收敛吗？

以上是自己的疑惑，还请各位老师百忙之中，不吝赐教！谢谢啦

title: 一些小疑问
body:
1.教程中，训练是不是基本都是输入图片，让算法训练，然后输出某个动作呢？
2.您说的离线强化学习，还有模仿学习，上线了吗？在哪里可以看到相关例子呢？离线强化学习目前有什么算法呢？你们实现了哪些算法？目前的SOTA算法是什么？我对于这个东西比较感兴趣。第一次接触强化学习，我一直以为必须有动作才能进行强化学习，可我做的项目，很多是动作极难实现，甚至根本无法实现动作，我想离线强化学习或许对我的工作很有帮助。我是做应用方向的，不是算法方向的，我希望知道离线强化学习，你们做了几个算法，分别有哪个例子，让我改改代码就可以用于我的工作中。
3.pytorch，tensorflow都是非常支持C++的，parl对于C++来说，支持效果好吗？如果目前支持效果不好，你们打算完善这方面吗？对于paddlex来说，无论是图像分类，目标检测，语义分割，实例分割，目前都可以做到0python代码应用，python代码用相关教程中的代码就可以了，改改batch，epochs，lr等几个重要参数，就可以训练出很不错的模型。部署方面也可以做到无需自己编写代码，无论是python部署，还是C++部署。可是对于强化学习来说，预测前的所有步骤，比如训练的所有相关定义，不可能全部用你们例子代码改吧，就想问问，我要是用parl做一个项目，能不能从头到尾用C++来编写代码，本地VS2022IDE？

body: 目前离线强化学习的一个主要问题就是在生成环境的时候很困难，只有很少的数据，没有env环境，也不知道怎么搞。我的建议是parl可以在生成环境方面做些文章，比如说导入观察空间动作和奖励，定义一下动作逻辑，通过对抗生成网络或者别的技术生成更多数据，然后训练出来一个环境，这样再结合现有的算法，可以减小落地难度，扩大强化学习落地场景的范围

title: 高度代码封装,在ai studio多搞点项目,站在小白角度上想想问题吧,parl不是只给百度高级研究员用的
body:
兄弟,深有同感.我对于parl代码高度封装说了不少话了,飞桨回答者找了一堆理由坚决反对高度封装.我不知道他是如何理解高度封装的.一个函数A内部包含很多个函数BCDEFG等函数,难道开发者就不能调用BCDEFG函数了?一个类A包含很多类BCDEFG等等类对象,难道开发者就不能使用BCDEFG类?只要飞桨愿意提供没经过封装的函数,那么开发者依然可以使用这些函数,而不是说只能使用高度封装后的函数.举个例子,找图算法,在一张大图片里面,查找跟一张小图片最匹配的点,有一种算法是模板匹配,参考opencv的6种模板匹配,模板匹配用的方法是总误差.找图还有一种方法,一个像素和另外一个像素是否匹配,根据这种算法来得出一张图片中和另外一张图片的相似度,我们把一个像素和另外一个像素是否匹配实现为一个函数B,把大图片中找小图片实现为另一个函数A,飞桨提供函数A,我们能调用,实现大图片找小图片的功能,如果飞桨愿意提供函数B,我们还是可以从底层入手.甚至自己写个类似的函数A.我就不知道,这种高度封装有什么问题?
我站在C++角度谈这些,python不懂,但我相信大同小异,只要飞桨parl愿意提供相关函数和算法,无论是底层,还是高层,都是可以调用的,不可能说弄了个高度封装的算法,底层就调用不了,这只能说飞桨parl代码组织能力差,出现大问题了.
强化学习,或者说深度强化学习发展的很好,起点可以认为是谷歌围棋的成功,谷歌围棋是算法的成功,而不是代码的成功,并没有使用高度难懂,难编写的代码,我就不相信使用keras无法写出谷歌那个围棋代码.
据我所知,谷歌围棋成功后,很多高手复现,改善相关算法,最牛逼的是katago算法.有人把katago围棋算法改成各种其他棋类的,基本上就是改了棋类规则,除了中国象棋和中国围棋之外,都改了,而且都实践过了,2060显卡跑一天,棋力远远超过不使用机器学习的算法.katago代码多少行,改动多少行可以做成其他棋类,parl自己算算,你们就知道代码高度封装或者弄多些项目多重要了.
看看ai studio的项目,最新项目有几个是parl?精品项目有几个是parl?ai studio 的项目,选择强化学习类别,能看到多少最近开发的项目?看看issue,parl有多少条目?平均多少天更新一条parl issue?我也是醉了,顶级学术论坛接收论文,强化学习占了一半,结果parl竟然连clas一个都比不过,笑死我了.
我在clas,dec等提问题,不会被删除,parl会.
我在parl提了几个问题,都是关于代码高度封装和离线强化学习.代码高度封装被拒绝了.到今时今日,我都不知道离线强化学习这个算法究竟复现完成了没有?我也不知道有没有相关项目,比较好理解简单代码不多的项目使用了离线强化学习这个算法.
paddlex,hub弄了项目合集,我使用paddlex,无论做图像分类,目标检测,语义分割,实例分割,改几行代码就可以完成训练和预测,比如图片路径改一下,训练epoch数量改一下,学习率改一下,超级简单,就可以训练,我真的懂得那些原理吗?我真的知道图片数据如何被clas,dec等处理吗?我真的知道预处理图片使用的具体算法吗?我真的会使用飞桨复现ResNet101?我都不知道,小白中的小白,但我会跑代码,图像分类等功能我就会用了.只要这些模块提供相关功能,一个功能弄几个项目,写点注释,我完全就会用了.飞桨能指望我自己去实现这么多功能才会用图像分类吗?parl有这么便捷吗?我觉得parl实现就是为了给那种万里挑一的程序员用的,他们得懂算法原理,甚至他们可以自己发明牛逼哄哄的算法,甚至能3天复现一个顶级学会论文的大佬才有资格使用,哈哈哈哈.C++随机数,封装成几个类,叫C++程序员实现这几个类,几个人会?他们得深刻理解什么是正态分布,什么是伯努利分布等等分布规则.他们还得知道计算机如何存储浮点数,如何存储整数.他们还得知道计算机产生随机数的几种算法,螺旋还是其他算法,等到这些都学会了,才能写出一个能生产随机数的函数?这完全就是在逗我.别的复杂东西可以高度封装,parl不行?一个DQN超级简单的算法,需要写几百行代码,哈哈哈哈.我还得买几本强化学习的书籍,学习英语,看一堆顶会论文,复现论文?那做飞桨干嘛,我自己复现就行了.
我真心觉得parl就是给百度研究人员用的,别的人,无论是小白,还是高手,都用不了.小白不可能一个项目自己写一堆代码.高手真的一定会选择飞桨parl?pytorch,tensorflow,等等,都有强化学习组件吧?为什么非要选择中文的飞桨parl?腾讯的强化学习搞定王者荣耀,飞桨parl搞定电网?搞定强化学习,每个人都懂的什么意思,搞定电网,几个人懂得什么意思?几个人关注?如果只是搞定电网的某个比赛,关注者就更少了.王者荣耀2亿用户,至少1千万人关注吧.至少5千万人跟强化学习得到的模型对战过吧,电网几个人关注,得到冠军很爽?而且你弄个电网冠军,我用的了这个东西吗?为了造福世界,我电价能低一点?
飞桨parl更新都不知道更新了什么内容,算法复现完成了没有我都不知道.
机器学习,本质上就是输入和输出.输入是图片,文字,或者一串数据,输出某种类型的结果,中间可以认为是个算法.对于离线强化学习,输入一组数据,或者一堆图片,经过你们复现论文的算法,或者你们自己研究出来的算法,让我得到一个模型,这个模型牛逼哄哄,超级厉害,这不能封装?这样做的话,不就可以做到一个很简单的项目搞定一个牛逼哄哄的算法.我只需要关注,我输入的图片的质量,或者我输入的数据的质量,不需要关心算法,不需要关心算法如何训练我输入的图片或者数据,不需要关心模型如何训练的,不需要写那么多代码.
看了parl的issue,提到离线强化学习是最多的,估计也是世界上最关注的,封装成一个函数做不到,那就封装成3个,10个名字有点不同的函数.C++随机数也是封装成几个类,而不是一个类,C++随机数一个类就弄一种算法,几个类就是几种算法,比如mt19937.
离线强化学习如果无法弄成一个函数,那就弄成多个函数,离线强化学习有多少种算法,弄几个函数不就好了.
你们非要把parl弄得只有很厉害的程序员才能使用,或者说,才用的好,我也没话说,无语.
围棋katago改编成五子棋,六子棋,作者就看规则相关代码,其他所有代码,无论是katago算法,上传对局代码,tensorrt,cuda代码,还是其他代码,都不去看.因为他就只改改规则,这才是真正的应用.
真心希望parl可以做到输入图片或者一串数据,就得到一个牛逼哄哄的模型,那就爽歪歪了.
叫我学习算法原理,数据如何组织,这真是我的责任吗?这应该是飞桨parl开发者的责任.
我连最简单的神经网络都不会写,但我可以依靠飞桨提供的个个开发套件加上项目,来掌握很多功能,比如图像分类,语义相似度等等.如果我真的把所有算法原理都掌握,甚至复现这些顶会论文,我还需要飞桨干嘛?就拿图像分类来说,掌握paddlex一个图像分类所有代码的人,有多少?能用paddlex做图像分类的功能的人有多少?完全不成比例.

title: 代码高度封装,跪求10行代码应用parl
body:
我说几点看法:
1.我不认为数据预处理算是强化学习的一个流程.这应该算是强化学习之前的步骤.paddlex也是几行代码搞定一个功能,比如图像分类,但是paddlex不会把数据预处理当成深度学习训练的一个流程.MNIST图片可以直接传入paddlex,其实还可以把mnist图片先做预处理,比如白色部分截下来,去除外部黑色部分,然后图片再扩大成28*28,这样准确率99+,不使用深度学习就99+.这是预处理数据过程,真的算是paddlex的一部分吗?我看未必,比方说这个预处理过程是可以用一万种编程语言来写的,不一定非要用python.
2.输入数据或者图片,定义一个小模型或者大模型,比如是2层的神经网络还是ResNet101,然后通过选择飞桨parl包装好的强化学习算法,进行训练,得到一个很厉害的模型,这才是应用开发者的方向吧.你们做parl如果是为了夺得世界冠军,你们可以把代码弄得很复杂,完全不封装,你们甚至还可以用C++去写,不用python啊.而且我也搞不懂,为什么高度封装就不能得到冠军?你们弄两套代码,一套高度封装,一个高层函数包含多个底层函数的代码,你们自己用底层函数的代码去得冠军不就行了?
3.我们作为应用开发者,只能应用API,或者是从一个简单几行代码去更改.我们根本不可能掌握强化学习算法原理,算法如何使得模型对数据进行训练,损失函数该如何选择,等等,我们真做不了.python著名的根本原因就是开发效率比C++快多了,你们开发一个库,要是需要使用者先掌握相关算法原理,甚至数据都要预处理,复现顶会论文算法,做一大堆工作,那为什么不自己写这些算法,还需要你们开发parl呢?我们没那个实力掌握那么多,只能在你们建好的大厦上去应用.有人开发了围棋katago,有人把围棋katago改成五子棋,六子棋等,只改了棋类规则,一样是世界冠军,他真的懂得katago的算法,看得懂katago那么多C++,python代码?懂得tensorrt,cuda代码如何写?他只是负责改棋类规则,还有极少量工作,然后就是显卡跑训练,2060训练一天,五子棋天下第一,六子棋天下第一,这不是冠军吗?这可是世界公认的冠军,一天,就显卡跑一天,改改规则,搞定.这个人真的懂得katago的算法?懂得katago比起阿尔法狗有什么长进?真的会编写一堆代码?还是简单的好啊,真的.你们说自己是世界冠军,你们现在弄个算法,2060跑一天,真的就是世界冠军吗?不相信.
4.我真心觉得你们应该比拼的是实现顶级算法的能力,paddleclas等合集都是有什么好算法,往往就包含进去.然后我们很容易使用,超级简单.parl算法,你们有没有试过棋类复现,能否达到世界冠军?打王者荣耀能否打败顶尖职业选手?我想你们都没做吧,主要就看atari游戏能否达到论文指标吧.
@TomorrowIsAnOtherDay

title: model的输入数据类型
body:
TypeError: The type of input[0] in fc must be Variable, but received <class 'numpy.ndarray'>

Model文件下
value(obs)函数的网络层输入obs ，因为是通信环境的信道状态，所以输入的obs会是向量，或者矩阵这样类型的数据，方便批处理。不知道有没有对数据类型做泛化，我输入的是状态矩阵，错误提示输入数据的类型不对。

贴一段tensorflow代码做参考。s就是obs。我没学过，看不懂tensorflow。
s= {Tensor: (None 50)}Tensor("s:0", shape=(None, 50), dtype=float32)
    def create_dqn(self, s, name):
        with tf.variable_scope(name + '.0', reuse=reuse):
            w = self.variable_w([self.state_num, 128])
            b = self.variable_b([128])
            l = tf.nn.relu(tf.matmul(s, w) + b)
        with tf.variable_scope(name + '.1', reuse=reuse):
            w = self.variable_w([128, 64])
            b = self.variable_b([64])
            l = tf.nn.relu(tf.matmul(l, w) + b)
        with tf.variable_scope(name + '.2', reuse=reuse):
            w = self.variable_w([64, self.action_num])
            b = self.variable_b([self.action_num])
            q_hat = tf.matmul(l, w) + b
        return q_hat

body:
京东搜索强化学习,可以找到很多书籍,但是市面上应该没有一本专门讲飞桨强化学习的书籍,多数强化学习书籍也不是使用飞桨编写代码的.
现在很多人都是靠读书入门甚至深入学习强化学习,希望你们可以使用飞桨ai studio复现强化学习相关书籍的代码.
在ai studio上面弄一个项目合集,复现一本书籍代码,10个项目合集就是10本书籍代码.
https://aistudio.baidu.com/aistudio/projectdetail/231146,参考这个链接.
我相信,使用飞桨平台复现书籍代码,可以使得很多人投入飞桨的怀抱,毕竟很多人是靠这些书籍入门的.而且编写书籍代码的难度并不高,这些书籍讲的不可能是太高深的知识.还有一点理由,编写代码肯定比做视频教学容易得多.做视频需要录制视频,剪辑,删改,上字幕,做ppt,word等.
希望各位大佬可以考虑小弟这个建议,依小弟看,各位大佬复现代码书籍,一个人15天左右就可以复现一本书籍了,轻轻松松,哈哈哈哈.

title: SAC算法加上卷积层后每次都输出同一个动作
判断有没有帧是结束帧
body:
https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PARL/blob/50a173987159e6e8ff532319ca24de89bd1e72d2/benchmark/torch/dqn/replay_memory.py#L69

您好，这里我不是很理解，希望您有空可以指导下：
随机抽取一条经验，这个经验的obs是4帧数据，在智能体做决策的时候，它是使用过去4帧做决策的；当我们随机抽取一条经验的时候，这条经验中的obs应该是采取那一下动作前的4帧画面，如果这4帧中有done的存在，那么是不是把done之前的数据变成0.
这样理解的话，那obs_idx = np.arange(idx, idx + self.context_len + 1) % self._curr_sizes是不是应该换成 idx, idx - context - 1呢？
另外有一点不太理解的是，为什么要从self.context_len - 2（1）也就是前两帧判断是否为done呢，后面两帧就不可能是done码？

title: 请问GPU是怎么安装使用的？
关于DQN算法中，目标网络的问题。
body: 请问各位，DQN算法中要用Q网络逼近Q-target网络，Q-target网络的参数来源于Q网络的定期更新，比如说更新周期是100个episode，那就是说Q网络去逼近100个周期之间的目标网络，可是Q网络经过了100个周期的训练，不是应该更准确了吗，为什么要去逼近更不准确的网络。

title: 请问examples-MADDPG中，对agent优化是用的每个agent各自的reward吗？不是全局的reward吗？
body:
在simple_agent文件中，代码段如下：
        # sample batch
        rpm_sample_index = self.rpm.make_index(self.batch_size)
        for i in range(self.n):
            batch_obs, batch_act, _, batch_obs_next, _ \
                = agents[i].rpm.sample_batch_by_index(rpm_sample_index)
            batch_obs_n.append(batch_obs)
            batch_act_n.append(batch_act)
            batch_obs_next_n.append(batch_obs_next)
        _, _, batch_rew, _, batch_isOver = self.rpm.sample_batch_by_index(
            rpm_sample_index)

有2个问题：
Q1：送去优化的sample的经验是用的所有agent的obs, act, obs_next, 但是reward用的是每个agent各自的，寻优的就是agent各自最优，不是全局最优吧？这是不是属于分散训练，分散执行呢？
Q2：示例的MADDPG代码是适用于每个agent都是同类型（状态和动作一样）的是吗？
谢谢

title: 关于使用PARL框架实现手写汉字评价的咨询
body:
您好，我是一名高校的研究生，刚刚入门强化学习，也在使用PARL框架来完成自己的项目。
主要是 实现手写汉字的评价，如优良中及格等。
数据是一系列手写汉字图片。
目前的想法是使用 DQN 来完成决策系统，但是遇到了一些问题来向您咨询。
目前对于项目的构建是：
环境：其感知的数据是 标准优秀汉字灰度图 与 待评价汉字灰度图 
奖励：奖励基于待评价汉字与标准优秀汉字的各类特征的相似度，相似度越小奖励越大
动作：输出的是对这个汉字的评价 如 优良中及格。
由于这个环境下不满足马尔可夫性，动作的输出不会影响到环境的观测值（目前设计的另一个方案是 动作做出评价后，就选择对应评价组里的其他待评价同一汉字作为新的环境）
这个感觉上是强化学习的退化版，或者说是K-armed Bandit问题的拓展。
由于缺乏相关经验，请问当前的设计是否还是属于强化学习的范畴。
